title: NVIDIA Stock Up 250% in 2025 – AI Chip Demand Explodes
shortdescription: NVDA hits $200/share as data center orders surge 300% year-over-year.
description: NVIDIA's dominance in AI accelerators continues with record Q4 earnings – analysts predict $300 target by year-end amid chip shortage.
author: Market Analyst

title: Fed Signals December Rate Cut: Markets Rally 2% on Powell's Hints
shortdescription: Chair Jerome Powell's dovish comments spark buying frenzy across S&P 500.
description: FOMC minutes reveal 75% probability of 25bps cut – bonds yield drops, tech stocks lead surge as inflation cools to 2.1%.
author: Market Analyst

title: Tesla Q4 Earnings Beat Expectations: Robotaxi Launch Set for June 2025
shortdescription: TSLA up 8% after-hours on autonomous driving breakthrough announcement.
description: Elon Musk reveals unsupervised FSD approval imminent – Cybercab production starts Q2, shares target $400 by analysts.
author: Market Analyst

title: Amazon Prime Day 2025 Shatters Records: $14.2B Sales in 48 Hours
shortdescription: E-commerce giant reports 12% YoY growth, international markets drive 40% of revenue.
